title: Clash Royale API
text: royale provides R interface Clash Royale API.

title: Clash Royale API
text: can install development version royale GitHub :

title: Clash Royale API
text: Current endpoints included cards, rankings, tournaments, players, clans. get player’s data, can use: get clan, can use: Clans put long form, player clan observation:
code: library(royale)  cr_get_player('JYJQC88') #> # A tibble: 1 × 42 #>   tag      name     exp_l…¹ troph…² best_…³  wins losses battl…⁴ three…⁵ chall…⁶ #>   <chr>    <chr>      <int>   <int>   <int> <int>  <int>   <int>   <int>   <int> #> 1 #JYJQC88 christo…      50    7500    7500  6668   5052   20224    3297    2538 #> # … with 32 more variables: challenge_max_wins <int>, #> #   tournament_cards_won <int>, tournament_battle_count <int>, role <chr>, #> #   donations <int>, donations_received <int>, total_donations <int>, #> #   war_day_wins <int>, clan_cards_collected <int>, clan_tag <chr>, #> #   clan_name <chr>, clan_badge_id <int>, arena_id <int>, arena_name <chr>, #> #   league_statistics_current_season_trophies <int>, #> #   league_statistics_current_season_best_trophies <int>, … clan <- cr_get_clan('99R2PQVR') clan #> # A tibble: 42 × 29 #>    tag       name  type  descr…¹ badge…² clan_…³ clan_…⁴ locat…⁵ locat…⁶ locat…⁷ #>    <chr>     <chr> <chr> <chr>     <int>   <int>   <int>   <int> <chr>   <lgl>   #>  1 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  2 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  3 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  4 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  5 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  6 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  7 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  8 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #>  9 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #> 10 #99R2PQVR LeGe… invi… "LeGeN…  1.60e7   65911    3495  5.70e7 North … FALSE   #> # … with 32 more rows, 19 more variables: required_trophies <int>, #> #   donations_per_week <int>, clan_chest_status <chr>, clan_chest_level <int>, #> #   clan_chest_max_level <int>, members <int>, player_tag <chr>, #> #   player_name <chr>, player_role <chr>, player_last_seen <chr>, #> #   player_exp_level <int>, player_trophies <int>, player_arena_id <int>, #> #   player_arena_name <chr>, player_clan_rank <int>, #> #   player_previous_clan_rank <int>, player_donations <int>, … clan |>    dplyr::relocate(dplyr::starts_with('player'), .before = dplyr::everything()) #> # A tibble: 42 × 29 #>    player_tag player_n…¹ playe…² playe…³ playe…⁴ playe…⁵ playe…⁶ playe…⁷ playe…⁸ #>    <chr>      <chr>      <chr>   <chr>     <int>   <int>   <int> <chr>     <int> #>  1 #JYJQC88   christoph… coLead… 202303…      50    7500  5.40e7 Arena …       1 #>  2 #8G00QJPLV Yamech     member  202303…      50    7500  5.40e7 Arena …       2 #>  3 #PQL9VYJLV nicolai    coLead… 202303…      50    7500  5.40e7 Arena …       3 #>  4 #229GLRLG9 ⚡X.MAN⚡  coLead… 202303…      50    7268  5.40e7 Arena …       4 #>  5 #8Q9GJL28R Backpacke… elder   202303…      50    7149  5.40e7 Arena …       5 #>  6 #RJ0QVQJJL TC22       member  202303…      50    7139  5.40e7 Arena …       6 #>  7 #2GRYJ2QV  sontinice  elder   202303…      45    7065  5.40e7 Arena …       7 #>  8 #89U82VQ0R Frahba     elder   202303…      50    7023  5.40e7 Arena …       8 #>  9 #2908VQ08  Ribal      elder   202303…      50    7000  5.40e7 Arena …       9 #> 10 #8QGQP9JQG TBD        member  202303…      50    6903  5.40e7 Arena …      10 #> # … with 32 more rows, 20 more variables: player_previous_clan_rank <int>, #> #   player_donations <int>, player_donations_received <int>, #> #   player_clan_chest_points <int>, tag <chr>, name <chr>, type <chr>, #> #   description <chr>, badge_id <int>, clan_score <int>, #> #   clan_war_trophies <int>, location_id <int>, location_name <chr>, #> #   location_is_country <lgl>, required_trophies <int>, #> #   donations_per_week <int>, clan_chest_status <chr>, …

title: Clash Royale API
text: using RoyaleAPI proxy, can configured setting options(royale.use_proxy = TRUE). can turned setting options(royale.use_proxy = FALSE). default.

title: Clash Royale API
text: content affiliated , endorsed, sponsored, specifically approved Supercell Supercell responsible . information see Supercell’s Fan Content Policy: <www.supercell.com/fan-content-policy>.

title: Get Upcoming Chests — cr_get_battle_log
text: tag Required. player return. Default: JYJQC88 key Required. API key. See https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/documentation Default: cr_get_key()

title: Get card details — cr_get_cards
code: cr_get_cards(limit = NULL, after = NULL, before = NULL, key = cr_get_key())

title: Get card details — cr_get_cards
text: limit number items returned response. return items occur marker. return items occur marker. key Required. API key. See https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/documentation Default: cr_get_key()

title: Get Challenges — cr_get_challenges
code: cr_get_challenges(   limit = NULL,   after = NULL,   before = NULL,   key = cr_get_key() )

title: Get Challenges — cr_get_challenges
text: limit number items returned response. return items occur marker. return items occur marker. key Required. API key. See https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/documentation Default: cr_get_key()

title: Get a clan — cr_get_clan
text: clan Required. Clan tag. Default: 99R2PQVR key Required. API key. See <https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/documentation> Default: cr_get_key

title: Get current clan members — cr_get_clan_members
code: cr_get_clan_members(   clan = "99R2PQVR",   limit = NULL,   after = NULL,   before = NULL,   key = cr_get_key() )

title: Get current clan members — cr_get_clan_members
text: clan Required. Clan tag. Default: 99R2PQVR limit number items returned response. return items occur marker. return items occur marker. key Required. Clash Royale API key. See <https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/documentation> Default: cr_get_key

title: Search Clans — cr_get_clan_search
code: cr_get_clan_search(   name = NULL,   location_id = NULL,   min_members = NULL,   max_members = NULL,   min_score = NULL,   limit = NULL,   after = NULL,   before = NULL,   key = cr_get_key() )

title: Search Clans — cr_get_clan_search
text: name Search clans name location_id Filter clan location identifier min_members Filter minimum number clan members max_members Filter maximum number clan members min_score Filter minimum amount clan score limit number items returned response. return items occur marker. return items occur marker. key Required. API key. See <https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/documentation> Default: cr_get_key

what: Set Clash Royale API key — cr_set_key
title: Set Clash Royale API key — cr_set_key
text: Sets Clash Royale API key default use.

title: Set Clash Royale API key — cr_set_key
Set Clash Royale API key — cr_set_key
text: key Required. Clash Royale API key. See <https://developer.clashroyale.com/#/getting-started>. overwrite Defaults FALSE. Boolean. existing `CR_API_KEY` Renviron overwritten? install Defaults FALSE. Boolean. added '~/.Renviron' file?

title: Set Clash Royale API key — cr_set_key
Set Clash Royale API key — cr_set_key

what: Get Clash Royale API key — key
title: Get Clash Royale API key — key
text: Retrieves Clash Royale API key set `cr_set_key()` `cr_get_key()` indicates one set `cr_has_key()`.

title: Get Clash Royale API key — key
Get Clash Royale API key — key
Get Clash Royale API key — key
